{"tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images/add-image-filter": { "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images/add-image-filter", "created": "20220517014805118", "modified": "20220517091720086", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "[is[image]]", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images/icon": { "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images/icon", "text": "", "type": "image/png", "created": "20220517015706171", "modified": "20220517091720086", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images/readme", "created": "20220516180933443", "modified": "20220517091720086", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "link: http://www.telumire.be/TiddlyTweaks/index.html#:%5B%5B%24:/ThemeTweaks/FaviconWizard%5D%5D\n\n''TODO'': add custom image filter\n\n[ ] add search bar for editor area `ctrl shift I `\n[ ] ", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images/version": { "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images/version", "created": "20220516180954950", "modified": "20220517091720086", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{ $:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images!!version}}", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/showInfo/search/titles": { "title": "$:/showInfo/search/titles", "created": "20211108110652618", "hide-body": "yes", "modified": "20220517090048586", "tags": "$:/showInfo/search $:/showInfo", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "
  • <$link to=<> />
    • ", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/showInfo/search/list/titles": { "title": "$:/showInfo/search/list/titles", "created": "20211108110810371", "modified": "20220517090048585", "tags": "$:/showInfo $:/showInfo/search", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$vars\n\nsearch-list=\"[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[tip]]\"\nitem-template=\"$:/showInfo/search/titles\"\nlist-class=\"\"\nlist-style=\"\"\" \"\"\"\n\n>\n\n{{$:/showInfo/search/template}}\n\n", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/showInfo/search/SystemImage": { "created": "20210911212256922", "text": "List of all system images (ie, tiddlers tagged {{$:/tags/Image||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}}). Click on an icon to copy its title !\n\n<$vars\nsearch-list=\"[[$:/tags/Image]tagging[]] {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images/add-image-filter}}\"\nitem-template=\"$:/showInfo/search/img\"\nlist-class=\"\"\nlist-style=\"\"\"padding:0; \"\"\"\n>\n{{{[is[blank]then[$:/showInfo/search/list/titles]else]}}}\n{{$:/showInfo/search/template}}\n", "title": "$:/showInfo/search/SystemImage", "modified": "20220517090048585", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar $:/showInfo/search $:/showInfo", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "caption": " {{$:/core/images/picture}} Images", "icon": "$:/core/images/picture", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/showInfo/search/tagging": { "title": "$:/showInfo/search/tagging", "created": "20211108114659440", "modified": "20220517090048586", "tags": "$:/showInfo/search $:/showInfo", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$vars search-list=\"[all[current]tagging[]]\">{{$:/showInfo/search/template}}", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/showInfo/search/img": { "title": "$:/showInfo/search/img", "created": "20210911222821934", "hide-body": "yes", "modified": "20220517090048585", "tags": "$:/showInfo/search $:/showInfo", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$button message=\"tm-copy-to-clipboard\" param=<> class=\"tc-btn-invisible search-list-img\" tooltip=<>>\n<$transclude tiddler=<>/>\n", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/showInfo/search/img/style": { "title": "$:/showInfo/search/img/style", "text": ".search-list-img :is(svg , img) {\nfont-size: 2em;\nmargin:5px;\n}\n\n.search-list-img img {\nobject-fit: contain;\nwidth: 2em;\nheight: auto;\n}", "created": "20210911225120089", "modified": "20220517090048585", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet $:/showInfo", "type": "text/css", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/showInfo/search/template": { "title": "$:/showInfo/search/template", "created": "20210911022445519", "description": "See $:/showInfo/search/SystemImage for an example of how to use this template.", "modified": "20220517090048586", "tags": "$:/showInfo/search $:/showInfo", "task": "doing", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\n
    \n<$edit-text tiddler=<> field=\"text\" tag=\"input\" default=\"\" placeholder={{$:/showInfo/search/placeholder}} class=\"tc-edit-texteditor\"/>\n<$reveal state=<> type=\"nomatch\" text=\"\">\n<$button class=\"tc-btn-invisible\" tooltip=\"cancel search\"> \n<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=\"\"/>\n{{$:/core/images/close-button}}\n\n\n<$button class=\"tc-btn-invisible\" tooltip=\"advanced search\"> \n<$action-listops \n$tiddler=<> \n$field=\"text\" \n$subfilter=\"+[toggle[yes],[no]]\"/>\n{{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}\n\n
    \n\n<$reveal default={{{ [[$:/temp/advanced-search/show]addsuffixget[text]] }}} type=\"match\" text=\"yes\">\n

    Advanced search

    \n
    \n<$edit-text tiddler=<> field=\"text\" tag=\"input\" default=\"[search:[]]\" placeholder=\"write an additional filter here\" class=\"tc-edit-texteditor\"/>\n<$reveal state=<> type=\"nomatch\" text=\"\">\n<$button class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">\n<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=\"[search:[]]\"/>\n{{$:/core/images/close-button}}\n\n\n
    \n\n\n\n<$set name=search tiddler=<> field=\"text\">\n<$set name=filter tiddler=<> field=\"text\">\n<$set name=filter value={{{ [match[]then[+]else] }}}>\n\n
      > style=<> >\n<$list filter=\"[subfilterfilter]+[search:*]\" variable=\"item\" template={{{ [is[blank]then[$:/showInfo/search/titles]else] }}} />\n
    \n\n\n\n\n    ", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/showInfo/tagging": { "title": "$:/showInfo/tagging", "created": "20210907002753004", "description": "todo : add a field tagging-filter", "modified": "20220517090048586", "tagging": "after", "tags": "$:/showInfo/tagging $:/showInfo", "task": "todo", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/showInfo/search": { "title": "$:/showInfo/search", "created": "20210922020055129", "modified": "20220517090048585", "tagging": "after", "tags": "$:/showInfo", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/showInfo/search/SystemImage/search/style": { "title": "$:/showInfo/search/SystemImage/search/style", "created": "20210911022400630", "fill-fallback": "", "modified": "20220517090048585", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet $:/showInfo/search $:/showInfo", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "
    \n.search-list-container {\ndisplay:flex;\nalign-items: center;\n}\n\n.search-list-container button {\npadding:.5em;\n}\n\n.system-image-search svg {\n\nfill:<>;\n\n}\n\n.tc-edit-texteditor {\n  width:100%;\n\tpadding: 3px 3px 3px 3px;\n\tborder: 1px solid rgb(63, 63, 63);\n\tline-height: 1.3em;\n\t-webkit-appearance: none;\n}",
    "revision": "0",
    "bag": "default"
},

"$:/showInfo/search/placeholder": {
    "title": "$:/showInfo/search/placeholder",
    "created": "20211108112823311",
    "modified": "20220517090048585",
    "tags": "$:/showInfo $:/showInfo/search",
    "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki",
    "text": "search..",
    "revision": "0",
    "bag": "default"
}}
}
author: oeyoews
name: Search  Images
title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images
